name: Duplicati
short_description: Free, open-source backup tool with encryption, deduplication, and cloud storage support.
description: Duplicati is a free, open-source backup client that stores encrypted, incremental backups to cloud storage services or local drives. It works with a wide range of protocols including SFTP, FTP, WebDAV, and cloud providers. Features include AES-256 encryption, source-code deduplication to reduce storage, backup scheduling, retention policies, version history, email notifications, and a powerful web interface. Perfect for setting up automated backups of your server data to local NAS, remote servers, or cloud storage - all with strong encryption so even the backup location can't read your data.
usecases: Automated encrypted backups of your server to local NAS or remote storage.
Backup to multiple destinations (local + cloud) for redundancy.
Restore specific files or entire backups on demand.
Use deduplication to minimize storage requirements.
notes: Supports SFTP, FTP, WebDAV, B2, S3, and many cloud backends
Incremental backups only store changed files
